alert.note: Alert for Austin; Colorado; Fort Bend; Wharton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 8:32AM CST until January 27 at 10:34PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Cypress Creek Near Sharp Road affecting Fort Bend and Harris Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... San Bernard River Near East Bernard affecting Wharton, Austin, Colorado and Fort Bend Counties. For the Cypress Creek...including Eldridge Parkway, Mathis Road, Sharp Road, Katy-Hockley Road, Hufmeister Road, Grant Road, Kohrville, Stuebner-Airline Road, Westfield, Kuykendahl Road, Cypresswood Drive, Inverness Forest...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...San Bernard River Near East Bernard. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins in the vicinity of the gage with minor roads along the river inundated. Backwater flooding up Britt Branch and Bratcher Slough begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CST Friday the stage was 17.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 AM CST Friday was 18.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 9.2 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.2 feet on 01/05/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon San Bernard River East Bernard 17.0 17.2 Fri 8 am CST 15.2 12.5 11.0 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1045 PM CST.
